attributes.background: Why should we pay tax for sugar? Don't we pay enough? Why should we pay for our health choices.

rejection.details:
The Government has not announced any plans for a specific tax on sugar. 

In the Budget in March this year, the Chancellor announced that the Government would be introducing a sugar levy on the soft drinks industry in 2018.

If you would like the Government not to introduce this levy, you could start a new petition asking it to change its plans.
